color_picking_instruction_1: Click anywhere on the screen to pick a color
color_picking_instruction_2: Press the Esc key to cancel the operation
onboarding_instruction_1: Click the button in the top-right corner to enter color-picking mode
api_key_note: Your API key will only be stored locally on your device and will not be uploaded to any server or external system. Please keep your API key secure.
model_description: Models with fewer parameters usually respond faster and are more cost-effective, while those with more parameters provide richer expressions.
language_note: Some settings require a restart to take effect.
color_pick_shortcut_description: The combination must include at least one of Alt, Cmd/Ctrl, or Shift. Press Backspace to clear the setting.
color_pick_shortcut_alert: This combination is already in use by the system. Please set a new one.
error_model_invalid: Please select a language model in the settings menu in the bottom-right corner first.
error_api_key_invalid: Please enter a valid API key for the language model in the settings menu in the bottom-right corner first.
error_no_response: No response from the API. Please check your settings or network connection.
error_unhandled_error: An unknown error occurred. Please check your settings and try again.
